title: Muscle cell
summary: A muscle cell is also known as a myocyte when referring to either a cardiac muscle cell (cardiomyocyte), or a smooth muscle cell as these are both small cells.[1] A skeletal muscle cell is long and threadlike with many nuclei and is called a muscle fiber.[1] Muscle cells (including myocytes and muscle fibers) develop from embryonic precursor cells called myoblasts.[2]
